column2: World Bank Inoti Kuda Kutanga Bhizimisi muZimbabwe Kuchiri Kunetsa
column3: Gwaro reWorld Bank rinoratidza mamiriro ezvinhu munyika dzepasi rose panyaya dzekuita bhizimisi munyika idzi rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe ichiri pachinhano chepasi, zvisinei nechinangwa chehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa chekuda kuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika. Mugwaro iri, iro rinonzi “Doing business” regore ra2019, Zimbabwe iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neshanu. Mugore rino ra2018 Zimbabwe yange iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu nepfumbamwe. Chipangamazano musangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe Doctor Propser Chitambara avo vanovewo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vanoti dambudziko guru panyaya yekuvandudza hupfumi pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika inyaya yekuti hurumende inotaura zvinhu zvaisingaite. Mauritius iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri ndiyo nyika iri pachinhano chepamusoro-soro panyika dzemuAfrica ichiteverwa neRwanda iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri nepfumbamwe. Panyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica South Africa iri pachinhano chemakumi masere nepiri (82) Botswana iri pachinhano chemakumi masere netanhatu (86). Zambia iri pachinzvimbo chemakumi masere nenomwe (87) kozotiwo Namibia iri pachinzvimbo chezana nenomwe (107). Gwaro iri rinotarisa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira kuti zvinotora nguva yakareba sei kuti munhu akwanise kutanga bhizimisi, zviri nyore here kuwana magetsi, nezvimwe zvakadaro. VaReginald Shoko vanove mukuru wesangano reAffirmative Action mudunhu reMatabeleland vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutora muenzaniso wenyika yeRwanda iyo yakabvisa mitemo yakawanda pakuvhura mabhizimisi munyika iyi. VaButler Tambo muongorori wezve budiriro anoshanda akazvimirira vanoti rimwe dambudziko guru rinokanganisa kuvandudzwa kwehupfumi pamwe nekuitwa kwebhizimisi munyika inyaya yemitemo isina kujeka. VaTambo vanotiwo nyaya yekuti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi iri kupa kuti hurumende ingovimbisa zvaisiri kukwanisa kuita. Vati hurumende inofanira kuzvipira kurwisa huori uho huri kukanganisa nyaya yebudiriro kana kukwezva vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi. VaChitambara vanobvumiranawo nemaonero aya. Mugwaro ra2019 nyika yeDjibouti ndeimwe yenyika dzakasimukira zvikuru kubva pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neina kusvika pachinhano chemakumi mapfumbamwe nepfumbamwe. Gwaro iri rinoti nyika iyi yakkwanisa kuita izvi nekuvandudza mitemo yayo kusanganisira kuita kuti vanhu vakwanise kunyoresa mabhizimisi avo munguva pfupi. Bhanga reWorld Bank rinoburitsa gwaro re”Doing Business” gore rega rega. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi, asi ivo nemutungangamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pasi pedingidzira ravo rekuti Zimbabwe Yakavhura Magonhi ekuita bhizimisi kana kuti "Zimbabwe Is Open for Business" vanotaura nyaya yekurerutsa kuita mabhizimisi munyika sechinhu chavanonyanya kukoshesa.

column2: Mamonya onokwikwidza kuSA
column3: SANGANO reZimbabwe Powerlifting Federation (ZPF) riri mushishi yekuumba chikwata chenyanzvi 10 dzinosimudza masimbi ekuvaka muviri avo vachaenda kunomirira Zimbabwe kumakwikwi achaitwa kunyika yeSouth Africa munguva inotevera.   Muna Chikumi, nyanzvi dzekusimudza masimbi dzepasi rose dzichange dzichirakidzana masimba mumakwikwi eWorld Classic Open Powerlifting Championships ayo achaitirwa kuSun City, kuSouth Africa.   Sachigaro weZPF mupurovhinzi yeHarare, Moses Nyamhotsi, anoti vakatotanga kuita gadziriro dzekuenda kumutambo uyu.   Mumasvondo anotevera, anodaro Nyamhotsi, vachaita mitambo yakawanda yekusarudza chikwata chavo chevatambi 10 – varume vashanu nemadzimai mashanu.   “MunaChikumi, tinoda kutumira chikwata chedu kumutambo weWorld Classic Open Powerlifting Championship kuSouth Africa. Mutambo uyu mukuru uye vatambi vose vanoda chaizvo kuenda kunokwikwidza.   “Isu chinangwa chedu kutumira vatambi vedu 10 vanoti varume vashanu nemadzimai mashanu. Saka mumasvondo anotevera tichange tichiita mitambo yakasiyana tichisarudza vatambi vedu vatinoda kuti vapinde muchikwata chatichazotumira kuenda kuSun City kunomirira nyika kumutambo uyu.   “Tarisiro yedu ndeyekuti chikwata chedu tinge tapedza kuchisarudza munaKurume,” anodaro Nyamhotsi.   Aka kachange kari kekutanga Zimbabwe ichitumira vatambi kumutambo uyu.   Nyamhotsi anoti vanotarisira kuti chikwata chavo chiende kunobata basa sebasa kumakwikwi aya.   “Kuenda kwatichaita kuSouth Africa, tinoda kuti chikwata chedu chigonobata basa sebasa kwete kuenda kunozadzikisa chete.   Tiri kuda kutonohwina, kunyangwe tichiziva hedu kuti mutoro wacho unenge wakakura sezvo chikwata chedu chichasangana nedzimwe shasha dzepasi rose,” anodaro Nyamhotsi.

column2: Zimbabwe Yotambira Dzimwe Nhomba dzeCovid-19 Kubva KuChina
column3: Zimbabwe nemusi weMuvhuro yakatambira dzimwe nhomba dzedenda reCovid-19 kubva kuChina panguva iyo paine kurudziro yekuti hurumende ishande zvakasimba kuti nhomba idzi dzitengwe dzakawanda kuitira kuti dzikwanire veruzhinji. Zimbabwe yawana dzimwe nhomba zviuru mazana manomwe (700 000) dzeSinopharm dzabva kuChina. Nhomba idzi dzasvika munyika manheru ano mushure mekusvika kwenhomba zviuru mazana masere (800 000) dzakabva kuChina zvakare. Mukuru anoona nezvechirwere cheCovid 19 muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kushanda zvakasimba kuti nhomba dzeCovid 19 dziwande munyika kuitira kuti dzishandiswe mukurwisa denda iri. Doctor Mahomva vatiwo vanhu vanofanira kuramba vachienda munzvimbo dzose dziri kubayiwa nhomba idzi kuitira kuti vakwanise kubayiwa vozvidzivirirawo kudenda reCovid 19. Asi vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vatiwo hurumende inofanira kutenga nhomba dzakawanda nguva imwechete kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasanetseke kuwana nhomba idzi. Hurumende inoti vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba yekutamba kusvika mukupera kwezuva reChitatu vave miriyoni imwe nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nezviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi masere nevashanu (1 562 285) uye vakabayiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana manomwe zvine gumi nezvitatu nezana rimwe chete nemakumi matatu nemumwe chete (713 131). Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva pachakatanga kupinda munyika ichi vave zviuru zana nezvitatu zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevanomwe (103 567) uye vapora vave zviuru makumi manomwe nechimwe nemazana matatu ane makumi masere nevatatu (71 383). Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu makumi matanhatu (60) vakafa nezuro zvabva zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muZimbabwe pazviuru zvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi mana (3 340). Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba kuvanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available

column2: Vatsigiri vava kutenderwa munhandare
column3: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vakabaiwa majekiseni ose ekudzivirira Covid-19 vave kutenderwa kuona mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup. Sangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) rakanyorera kuZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) richazivisa kuti chikumbiro chavo chekuti mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup inge iine vatsigiri 2 000 munhandare chatambirwa.   Mutsamba yakanyorwa neSRC, akafanobata chigaro chadirector general – Sebastain Garikai – anoti vatsigiri 2 000 vachaona mitambo iyi vanofanirwa kunge vakabaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19 uye pose pavanoenda kumitambo iyi vagare vakapfeka mamasiki nekutevedzera matanho ose ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Chikumbiro chenyu chekuti vatsigiri vaone nhabvu vari munhandare chatambirwa. Saka vatsigiri vose vari muZone 3 neZone 4 vanofanirwa kuuya nemakadhi anoratidza kuti vakabaiwa majekiseni ose eCovid-19 pamwe nezvitupa zvavo kunhandare pavanenge vachipinda. “Naizvozvo, tinokurudzira kuti matikiti ekupinda mumitambo iyi atengeswe mitambo isati yatanga kuitira panhandare pasazoita nyonga-nyonga uye tinotarisira kuti pave nemagedhi akasiyana anopinda nekubuda nevanhu.   “Mazita evatsigiri aya anofanirwa kunge akatonyoreswa kare zvekuti pakupinda munhandare pane vanenge vachiongorora. Kana munhu zita rake risipo, haatenderwe kupinda munhandare macho.   “Mitemo iyi nemimwe ikoshesei uye ngaitevedzerwe nekuti mukasaitedzera zvinotituma kuti timise vatsigiri vacho kuuya kuzoona mitambo iyi,” anodaro Garikai.

column2: Ishe Makore Vanoti Havana Kufara neZvakaitwa naVaTsvangirai Mudunhu Ravo
column3: Ishe Makore vekumMasvingo mudunhu reGutu South vanoti havana kufara kuti bato reMDC rakaita musangano waro mudunhu ravo risina kuvapira. Ishe Makore vekumMasvingo mudunhu reGutu South vanoti havana kufara kuti bato reMDC rakaita musangano waro mudunhu ravo risina kuvapira. Pamusangano wakaitwa kwaGutu nemusi weChipiri, Ishe Makore vakabuda pachena kuti ndeve Zanu PF, vakapika kuti havasi kusiya dunhu ravo richiitirwa misangano neMDC. Pamusangano uyu vanhu vanonzi vakaenda kumusangano wakaitwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai nemusi we Mugovera vakaudzwa kuti vachaurayiwa. Asi Ishe Makore varamba mashoko aya vachiti ivo chavanopokana nacho, kuitwa kwemisangano ivo vasingazive. Vachitaura pamusangano wakaitwa neChipiri, uyo wakapindwa nemabhuku anosvika makumi matatu, Mambo Makore vakati vari kurwadzikana nevanhu vavo vakaenda kumusangano waVa Tsvangirai vakati havachabvumidzi misangano ye MDC mudunhu ravo. Ishe Makore vakatiwo vachadzinga masabhuku pamwe chete nemakanzura eMDCT akasangana naVaTsvangirai vasina kuziviswa saMambo wedunhu iri. Ishe Makore vakapomera kanzura wemubhuku eumnzvimbo iyi anomirira MDC kuita zviri kunze kwemutemo, vakati vachadzinga kanzura uyu mudunhu ravo. Musangano uyu wakasiya vagari vazhinji vaine kutya sezvo wakavimbisa kudzoka kwemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika mudunhu iri. No media source currently available

column2: VaChiyangwa Vokurudzira VaTsigiri veNhabvu Kuti Vanotambira maWarriors kuNhandare yeNdege
column3: Mutungamiri weZIFA VaPhilip Chiyangwa vari kukurudzira vanhu vose munyika kuti vaende kunhandare yendege yeHarare International Airport neChipiri masikati kunotambira chikwata cheZimbabwe Warriors icho chakashura mare nekudambura Zambia 3-1 kuSouth Africa nemusi weSvondo chichibva chasimudza mukombe weCOSAFA Castle Cup. Vachitaura neStudio 7, VaChiyangwa vati uyu mukombe wavo wekutanga vachitungamira sangano renhabvu reZIFA nekudaro vane mufaro mukuru. Vavimbisawo kuti vachaona kuti voitirei vakomana vemaWarriors ava. VaChiyangwa vakasarudzwa kuti vatungamire ZIFA muna 2015 mushure mekukunda musarudzo VaTrevor Carelse Juul, VaLeslie Gwindi naVaJames Takavada.

column2: Musangano weKimberly Process Wotanga KuAngola
column3: Musangano weKimberly Process Certification Intercessional Plenary Scheme watanga kuLuanda, Angola neChipiri Zimbabwe ichichema nerekuti pane dzimwe nyika dzichiri kurwisa kuti isabvumidzwe kutengesa mangoda ayo. Musangano uyu uri kupera nemusi weMugovera. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, gurukota rinoona nezvezvicherwa VaWalter Chidhakwa vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuita zvose zvinodiwa neKPC mukutengeswa kwemangoda. Vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuita zvose zvinodiwa neKPC mukutengeswa kwemangoda. Vamwe vakuru muhurumende vanoti sangano reWorld Policy Institute rinoda kuti Zimbabwe isatengesa mangoda nekuti iri kutengesa mangoda pamusika wekuDubai zvinonzi zvinogona kupa kuti mari dzemangoda dzigume dzave mumaoko evanopfurikidza mwero. Imwe kambani yekuBelgium inonzi Omega Diamonds yakabhadhariswa mari inosvika mamiriyoni zana nemamukumi mapfumbabwe nemashanu madhora ne KPC ichinzi yaisabhadhara mitero. Mangoda anotengeswa nekuDubai sezvinoitwa eZimbabwe anonzi anozoguma ave mumaoko emakoronyera uye vanhu vashoma ndivo vanoguma vowana mari yemangoda nenyaya yechikiribidi. Asi mukuru wekambani yePartnership Africa Canada, VaAllan Martin, avo vari kumusangano uyu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakuru vehurumende yeZimbabwe vari kungorova bembera dzenhema panyaya iyi. VaMartin vati KPC inofanira kuona kuti mangoda atengeswa zviri pamutemo uye haafanire kuguma ave mumaoko evanopfurikidza mwero. VaMartin vatiwo Zimbabwe haifanire kungovhunduka chati kwatara. Kunyange hazvo makambani ekuMarange ave nemakore achichera mangoda, vakawanda, kusanganisira mamwe makurukota ehurumende vanoti havasi kuziva kuti mari yacho inofambiswa sei. Vashandi vakawanda kumakambani ekuMarange vari kupedzawo mwedzi vasina kubhadharwa vamwe vachigumurwa. Vakawanda vaifunga kuti mangoda achavandudza hupfumi asi zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. Sachigaro wesangano reResources Exploitation Watch iro rinorerekera zvakanyanya kuhurumende, VaTafadzwa Musarara vanoti zvekunakumisa Zimbabwe kutengesa mangoda hazvishande. No media source currently available

column2: Varimi Votambira Kurudziro Yekuti Varimi Vatengese Dzimwe Mombe
column3: Rimwe sangano revarimiri, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers’ Union, ZCFU, rinoti varimi vanofanirwa kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vatapudze zvipfuwo zvavo munguva ino yekushaikwa kwemafuro, kuitira kuti vasazorasikirwa nepfuma yavo. Rimwe sangano revarimi, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers’ Union, ZCFU, rinoti varimi vanofanirwa kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vatapudze zvipfuwo zvavo munguva ino yekushaikwa kwemafuro, kuitira kuti vasazorasikirwa nepfuma yavo. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaJeremiah Tevera, vanoti sangano ravo ragara richikurudzira varimi vari mumatunhu ane nzara kuti vatengese zvimwe zvipfuwo zvavo kuitira kuti vawane mari yekutenga chikafu chekupa kune zvimwe zvipfuwo zvavanenge vasara nazvo. “Ishoko rakanaka ravari kutaura asi isu sesangano tinoona sekunge ranga ranonoka kuuya nekuti zvipfuwo zviri kufa,” VaTevera vanodaro. Mutevedzeri wegurukurota rezvekurima vakanangana nezvipfuwo, VaPaddy Zhanda, vanonzi nedandemutande renhau reThe Source vari kukurudzirawo varimi kuti vaite nhimuramiswe, vasachiva kuverenga mombe dzakawanda asi idzo dzichizofa dzoga nenzara. Vazhanda vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kushanya kumatunhu eMatabeland South neMatabeleland North neChitatu kuti vasangane nevarimi kuti vakurukure nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu pamwe nezvekurudziro yavo iyi. Takundikana kubata VaZhanda kuti tinzwe nezvehurongwa hwavo uhwu. Mombe dzinodarika zviuru zvinomwe dzinonzi dzafa mukati memwedzi mina yapfuura nekuda kwekushaiwa mafuro. Hurumende mwedzi wapera yakaparura chirongwa chekubatsira varimi nechikafu chezvipfuyo zvavo mudunhu reChiredzi, asi vamwe varimi vanonzi vari kukundikana kuwana madhora masere ekuti vatenge tsaga rimwe chete rechikafu ichi. No media source currently available

column2: Mitumbi yeVakafa muTsaona yeCyclone Idai Yofukurwa Kubva muMadhaka
column3: Mumiriri weManicaland muparamende pasi pehurongwa hwe Proportional Represenation, Amai Lynette Karenyi, veMDC, vanoti basa rekutsvaga mitumbi yevanhu vangadai vakafuchirwa nemadhaka mutsaona yeCyclone Idai pamwe nevamwe vangadai vachiri vapenyu riri kuenderera mberi muChimanimani neChipinge. Amai Karenyi vanoti dzimwe mhuri dziri kuita zvekufukura mitumbi yehama dzadzo dzakafushirwa mumadhaka nematombo pakawondomoka gomo, pamwe nepasi pedzimba dzakaparadzwa vanhu vareremo, mimwe mitumbi ichiwanikwa munzizi. Asi vanoti dambudziko guru richiripo nderekuti vanhu vawane rubatsiro, zvikuru rwechikafu, sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kunzvimbo dziri kure dzakaita sekwaMutsvangwa, vachinzi havasati vakwanisa kuwana rubatsiro rwezvekudya. Vanotiwo mishonga, zvikuru yemaARV, yakwanisa kusvitswa pakirinika yeMutsvangwa, uyewo madzimai matatu pamadzimai gumi nevatatu vakazvitakura vari pakirinika iyi vanonzi vakwanisa kusunuguka zvisina dambudziko. No media source currently available

column2: Bato reCCC Rinokurudzira Veruzhinji Kupfeka Nhumbi dzeYellow seMucherechedzo weKutsigira Nhengo Gumi neNhatu dziri muHusungwa
column3: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change rakurudzira neChishanu vana veZimbabwe kuti vapfeke nhumbi dzeruvara rwe yellow, senzira yekutsigira nhengo dzaro gumi nenhatu dziri muhusungwa mushure mekusungwa dzichipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. Nhengo idzi dzinonzi dzakakonzera mhirizhonga kuNyatsime kuChitungwiza zvichitevera kupondwa kwenhengo yeCCC, Muzvare Moreblessing Ali, avo vakazowanikwa mutumbi wavo wakachekwachekwa. Nhengo dzakasungwa dzinosanganisira mutevedzeri wasachigaro vebato uye vari mumiriri weZengeza West muparamende, VaJob Sikhala, pamwe nemumiriri weChitungwiza North, VaGodfrey Sithole. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCCC, VaGift Ostalos Siziba vanoti vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vabatane navo pakumira nenhengo dzavo gumi nenhatu idzi, idzo vanoti dziri kungoshungurudzwa sezvo dzakasungwa dzisina mhaka. VaSikhala naVaSithole vakanyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nedare reHigh Court, mutongi wedare achiti anotyira kuti vakapiwa mukana, zvikuru VaSikhala, vanonopara dzimwe mhosva. VaSikhala ndivo gweta remhuri yaMuzvare Ali.

column2: Hurumende Inomisa Chirongwa Chekupa Vadzidzi Zvitupa neNyaya yeCovid-19
column3: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakamisa neMugovera chirongwa chekuti vana vanoda kunyora bvunzo dzeOrdinary neAdvanced Level vatore zvitupa nekuda kwekutyira kupararira kweCovid-19, nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo dzinoti zvakakosha kuti chirongwa ichi chienderere mberi kuitira kuti pasaita nhubu dzinonyorera vamwe mazamanishoni. Hurumende yainge yaisa parutivi zuro nanhasi semazuva maviri ekuti vaya vanoda kunyora bvunzo gore rino vatore zvitupa, asi yakazomisa chirongwa ichi chave pakati nezuro masikati yave kutyira kuti denda reCovid-19 ringapararire zvakanyanya mushure mekunge vanhu vabuda zvine mutsindo. Bazi rezvemukati menyika pamwe nevakafanobata chigaro chaRegistrar-General, VaHenry Machiri, vakazivisa nezuro kuti vakamisa chirongwa ichi mushure mekunge vanhu vakawandisa vaenda kumahofisi avo kunotorerwa zvitupa. Mapurisa akatozoshevedzwa kuzochengetedza runyararo uye vamwe vakanga vatorara pamahofisi aRegistrar General aya vachida zvitupa. Mumwe mudzidzi wepane chimwe chikoro muHarare, Chipo Zhou, uyo akamukira pamahofisi aRegistrar-General ari paMachipisa mumusha weHigfiled muHarare, audza Studio 7 kuti akawana paine vanhu vaidarirka chiuru vakanga vave mumutseste nechakare uye akazobva asina kutora chitupa mushure mekuudzwa kuti chirongwa ichi chaitirwa vaye vanodzidza muzvikoro zvakazvimirira kana kuti private colleges. Mumwe murairiridzi wepane chimwe chikoro mumusha weGlen View uyo aramba kudzomwa nezita, audza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti chirongwa ichi chinobata vana vanodzidza kuma private collegel. Ati vanhu vari muzvikoro zvehurumende, makunzuru kana zvemakereke havadi zvitupa kuti vanyore bvunzo. Murairidzi uyu atiwo vana vakawanda vaida zvitupa nekuti vanodzidza muzvikoro zvakazvimirira kana kuti zvisina kunyoreswa nehurumende uye zvisingabvumidzwe kunyoresa bvunzo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo uye vari mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira varairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vanoda kunyora bvunzo vasingadzidzi muzvikoro vatore zvitupa vachiti izvi zvinodzivirira hutsotsi nechikiribidi pabvunzo. Doctor Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vanotambura kutora zvitupa munyika vachiti hapafaniri kuitwa zvematongerwo enyika pakutora zvitupa. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vanoti ichokwadi kuti vaya vasiri muzvikoro zvakanyoreswa kana kuti vari kudzidza kuma Non-Formal school, kana kuti vanganzi External Candidates, ndivo chete vanosungirwa kunge vaine zvitupa pabvunzo, kwete vanodzidza musvikoro zviri pasi pehurumende, makanzuru kana mamishoni. Zimbabwe Schools Examinations Council yakazivisa mwedzi wapera kuti vanoda kunyora bvunzo vanofanira kunge vabhadhara mari dzebvunzo musi wa9 Chikunguru uye vano nonoka vanofanira kubhadhara mari iyi musi wa30 Chikungururu. Doctor Zhou vaudza Studio 7 kuti vasina kukwanisa kutora zvitupa nezuro vachinenguva yekutora zvitupa izvi sezvo pachine nguva pazonosvika 30 Chikunguru. Vatiwo Covid-19 inogona kukanganisa kunyorwa kwebvunzo idzi uye semaonero avo, gore rino vana vachafoira zvakanyanya sezvo vasina nguva yekudzidza yakakwana uye varairidzi vasiri kudzidzisa nekuti havasi kufara nemihoro yavanotambira. Hurumende yakambomisa kuvhurwa kwezvikoro nekuti Covid-19 iri kupararira zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Inoti Zvikoro Zvichavhurwa Mwedzi Uno, Varairidzi Vachiti Zvikoro Hazvina Gadziriro Yakakwana
column3: Hurumende yakazivisa neChipiri kuti zvikoro zvave kuzovhurwa muzvikamu zviviri, chikamu chekutanga musiwa 15 Kurume kuchiti chikamu chepiri chiri musi wa 22 Kurume, unove mwedzi uno. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati vana vari kuita zvidzidzo zvinonyorwa bvunzo gore rino zveGrade 7, Form 4 neForm 6, ndivo vachatanga kuvhura musi wa 15. Vakatiwo varairidzi vari kudzidzisa zvidzidzo zviri muchikamu chekutanga vanofanirwa kunge vave kumabasa avo musi wa 10 mwedzi uno. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati vamwe vana vese vachange vachizovhura musi wa 22 Kurume, uye varairidzi vavo vanofanirwa kunge vave kumabasa avo musi wa 17. Vakati muzvikoro munenge musina mukana wekuti vana vasiye mikaha pakati pavo, vana vachapana mukana wekudzidza nguva dzakasiyanasiyana. Asi vakafannobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, VaGoodwell Taderera, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yazadzisa matanho anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organization pamwe nebazi rezvehutano isati yafunga zvekuvhura zvikoro. VaTaderera vanoti sesangano revashandi vanoti varairidzi vanofanirwawo zvakare kupiwa mihoro inovaita kuti vagare pamabasa, kwete zvekuti mudzidzisi anofunga zvekusiya basa ombonokorokoza. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro vakaudza Studio 7 neMuvhuro kuti bazi ravo rakagadzirira kuvhurwa kwezvikoro, uye svondo rapera vakuru vakuru vebazi ravo kusanganisira negurukota redzidzo yepasi VaCain Mathema vaishanyira zvikoro vachiona kuti zvakagadzirira zvakadii kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Vanoti zvikoro zvavakashanyira zvinosanganisira zvehurumende, zvine vana vanodzidza vachigarapo kana kuti boarding, izvo zvakamboita dambudziko reCovid-19 zvakanyanya, pamwewo nezvakazvimirira. VaNdoro vakati bazi ravo rakagudzikana nezvavakaona muzvikoro. No media source currently available

column2: Vagari vemuHarare Vochemachema neKushomeka kweMotokari dzeKanzuru Yavo Dzinotakura Varwere
column3: Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vari kuchema-chema nekushomeka kwemotokari dzekanzuru dzinotakura varwere, kana kuti maamburenzi, dzinova idzo dzine muripo uri nani zvichienzaniswa nedzemakambani akazvimirira. VaTaurai Zviripamwoyo, avo vakarwarirwa mazuva mashoma achangodarika, vanoti kunyangwe hazvo motokari dzinotakura varwere dzekanzuru yeHarare dziine muripo uri nani, hadziwanikwi zviri nyore. VaZviripamwoyo vanoti mamwe makambani ane motokari dzinotakura varwere akazvimirira anodhura zvakanyanya. Vachitaura neStudio 7, mumwe zvakare mugari wemuHarare, VaTanatsiwa Dambuza, vati kodzero yehutano iri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika haigoni kuzadzikiswa kana vagari vasiri kuwana motokari dzinotakura varwere dzine muripo uri pasi sedzekanzuru yeHarare. VaDambuza vakurudzira kanzuru kuti igadzirise dambudziko iri. Meya veguta reHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vatendawo kuti motokari dzinotakura varwere muguta ishoma zvakanyanya vachiti pari zvino dzinogona kunga dziri nomwe kana sere. Vawedzerawo vachiti kanzuru yavo ichange ichizeya nezvenyaya yekushomeka kwemotokari dzinotakura varwere kuti vagadzirise dambudziko iri. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti imotokari ngani dzingakwanira kanzuru, VaMafume vati kanzuru inoda mota dzinotakura varwere makumi maviri neshanu. Tsvakiridzo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti motokari dzekanzuru dzinotakura varwere ndidzo dzine mutengo yepasi inogonekwa nevagari vasina mari yakawanda. Pari zvino motokari dzinotakura varwere dzekanzuru yeHarare dzinobhadharisa makumi maviri emadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$20.00, vagari vachitenderwa kubhadhara nemari yemunyika. Ukuwo, makambani akazvimiririra achibhadarisa varwere mari inogona kusvika kuzana remadhora kana kuti US$100.00, kutakura murwere panguva yega yega. No media source currently available

column2: Vanhu Votarisirwa Kutanga Kubayiwa Nhomba yeSinopharm neMusi weChina
column3: Hurumende iri kutarisirwa kuparura chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 nemusi weChina uye inoti vachabayiwa pachikamu chekutanga chechirongwa ichi vanosanganisira machiremba, vakoti nevamwe vashandi vezvehutano. Izvi zvinotevera kupedza nemusi weChitatu kwekudzidziswa kwemashandisirwo enhomba iyi kwaitwa vashandi vehutano munyika yose. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemshoko, Seneta Monica Mutsvangwa, vanoti vashandi vehutano vange vari kudzidziswawo zvinhu zvakaita sekuti mishonga iyi inochengetwa sei. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhengo dzesangano ravo dziri kupinda muzvidzidzo izvi munyika yose. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevamwe vapinda muzvidzidzo izvi asi VaDongo vati hapana chakanyanyooma pazvidzidzo izvi sezvo vakoti vagara vachibaya nhomba dzezvimwe zvirwere. Vati vange vachitarisira kuti zvidzidzo izvi zvivape vakoti ruzivo pamusoro pemashandiro enhomba yeSinopharm. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota neChipiri manheru, Amai Mutsvangwa vakati nhomba iyi ichaendendeswa kumatunhu pachishandiswa nzira dzinoendeswa mimwe mishonga. Vakatiwo kunze kwevashandi vehutano, vamwe vachabayiwa pachikamu chekutanga mauto, mapurisa nemagadhijere uyewo vashandi veZimbabwe Revenue Authority pamwe neAgritex. Pachikamu chechipiri pachabaiwa varairidzi vezvikoro zvepasi nezvepamusoro uye vamwe vese vachabaiwa pasi pechikamu chekupedzesera. Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti vese vachabaiwa vachanyorwa mazita avo pasi uye vachaudzwa kuti vachazobaiwa riini zvekare sezvo vachifanira kubaiwa kaviri. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi izvo zvichaita mari inodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru mazana manomwe zvemadhora ekuAmerica. South Africa yakaparura hurongwa hwayo hwekubaya nhomba iyi neChitatu mutungamiriri wenyika iyi, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vachibaiwa veruzhinji vachiona. . No media source currently available

column2: Mapurisa neVasori Vogara Vakadzipakatira Sezvo Kugunun'una neHurumende yaVaMugabe Kwowedzera
column3: Hurumende inonzi yati vanochengetedza mukati menyika vagare vakadzipakatira kana kuti "high alert" sezvo zvinhu munyika zvaita manyama amire nerongo. Vamwe vakuru mumapurisa vataura neStudio 7 vati zvinhu hazvina kugadzikana munyika nenyaya yekusamira zvakanka munyaya dzezvehupfumi asi vati vakagadzirira kuona kuti hakuna kuratidzira kuchaitika. Vanhu vakawanda kusanganisa vechidiki, mapato ezvematongerwo enyika, vana muzvinabhizimisi uye vemachechi vave kubuda pachena kuti havasi kufara nezviri kuitwa nehurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Mapurisa anodzivirira mvongamupopoto akawanda ave kuendeswa kumadhorobha akawanda sezvo kuratidzira kwakatangira muHarare Nemusi weChishanu vesangano revechidiki richangoumbwa rinonzi veTajamuka iro rine vechidiki kubva kumasagano ezvematongerwo enyika akasiyana siyana, vadzidzi nevemamwe masangano rakendesa tsamba yenyunyuto kumahofisi eInternational Monetary Fund muHarare uko vanonzi vakasvika kwakazara vesangano revasori avo vakatanga kuvatevera. Tsamba yakasiiwa iyi yaikurudzira IMF kuti isadyidzane nehurumende yaVaMugabe yyavanotio iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu nekuita zvehuwori. KuMasvingo mapurisa anonzi akaramba kupa mvumo kuvemachechi nevamwe, vemasangano akazvimirira nevezvematongerwo enyika vange vachida kuratidzira vachiti havasi kufara nehutongi hwaVaMugabe. Officer commanding Masvingo Superitendent Philip Ncube vaKAudza vanhu ava kuti havasi kuzotenderwa kuratiudzira pasi pemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act kana kuti POSA. Nemusi weChina vamwe vechidiki veTajamuka vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nemapurisa mushure mekuratidzira muHarare. Vamwe vairatidzira muAfrica Unity Square mavhjiki apera vakambosungwa ndokuendeswa kuChikurubi neHarare Remand asi vakazobuda nemusi weChishanu muhure mekunge vabhadhara mari yechibatiso. Vana muzvinabhizimisi vane chitsama vari kunzi vari kubvunzurudzwa nemapurisa kana vachinge vangotaura kuti nyika yaenda kumawere. Bato guru rinopikisa reMDC-T riri kuratidzirawo mumadhorobha akasiyana siyana. Mubato riri kutonga reZanu-PF maberekerawo pongwe sezvo paine kunetsana kwakanyanya kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chaVaMugabe avo vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri asi pasina kujeka kuti achatora chigaro chavo ndiyani kana vasiya basa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika Vajoy mabenge vanoshanda nesangano recrisis in zimbabwe coalition vajoy mabenge. No media source currently available

column2: Argentina Yosimudza Mukombe weWorld Cup keChitatu
column3: Argentina yasimudza mukombe weFIFA World Cup kechitatu munhoroondo yenyika iyi mushure mekurova France 4-2 mumapenalties kuQatar. Argentina yakasimudza mukombe uyu kekutanga muna 1978 pawakatambirwa munyika iyi ichi ichitungamirwa nakaputeni wayo Daniel Passarella. Yakarova Netherlands 3-1. Yakazosimudza mukombe uyu zvekare muna 1986 ichitungamirirwa naDiego Maradona. Argentina yakarova West Germany 3-2 kumakwikwi akatambirwa kuMexico. Mumutambo wanhasi wange uchinakidza zvikuru, France neArgentina dzaita mangange 3-3 dzisati dzaenda kumapenalties. Argentina ndiyo yatanga kutungamira 2-0 muchikamu chekutanga mushure mekunge Lionel Messi anwisa penalty papera mamaminitsi makumi matatu nerimwe, (31’ mins), Angel Di Maria akanwisa chechipiri mushure memaminetsi makumi matatu nematanhatu, (36’mins).  Asi muchikamu chechipiri, Kylian Mbappe anwisa mushure memaminetsi makumi masere uye makumi masere nerimwe, (80’ ne 81’). Mutambo uyu wazoenda munguva yemuwedzeredzwa kana kuti extra time. Messi anwisa mushure memaminetsi zana nemasere (108’), Mbappe achizonwisa mushure nemaminetsi zana negumi nemasere (118’) . Nezvibodzwa zvitatu izvi, Mbappe ndiye anwisa zvibodzwa zvakawanda kudarika vamwe vatambi vose kuWorld Cip aine zvibodzwa zvisere achiteverwa naMessi ane zvinomwe. Mbappe apihwa mukombe wekurova mambure kakawanda kana kuti Golden Boot. Messi ndiye apihwa mukombe wekukunda vamwe vose kumakwikwi aya kana kuti Golden Ball.  Emiliano Martinez wekuArgentina ndiye akunda vamwe vabati vepagedhi vose kana kuti Golden Glove Award. Akunda vamwe vatambi vechidiki vose kana kuti Best youngster mutambi weArgentina zvekare Enzo Fernandez. Ane makore makumi maviri nerimwe.

column2: Munyika Moita Kusagadzikana neNyaya yeRufu rwaVaShiri Uye Kuratidzira
column3: Munyika hamuna kugadzikana zvichitevera hurongwa hwekuratidzira kuri kuda kuita nevanopikisa nemusi weChishanu uye kushaya kwegurukota rezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri. Nemusi weChitatu, Politburo yeZanu-PF yakapomera dzimwe nhengo dzebato iri mhosva yekushanda nevanopikisa kuratidzira kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vabviswe pachigaro. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri webato reZanu-PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakaudza vatori venhau neChitatu kuti nhengo yePolitburo, Amai Cleveria Chizema, vainge vamiswa kuva nhengo yebato nekuda kwekuti vainge vachishande nevamwe vavengi vebato kuda kupidigura hurumende. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika vanoti mubato mune mapisha pisha uye kupumhana huori. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti munyika hamuchina kugadzikana nenyaya yekunetsana mubato reZanu-PF kwopa kuti hurumende ingogara ichiti mauto agare akadzipakatira. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF inomirira Makonde, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti vekunze ndivo vari kuita kuti munyika musaite kugadzikana. No media source currently available

column2: WFP Yowedzera Kubatsira Zimbabwe Mushure Mekunge VaMugabe Vati Nzara Yapfunya Chisero muNyika
column3: Mutauriri wesangano reWorld Food Programme kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaDavid Orr vanoti mashoko emutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ekuti Zimbabwe inyika iri parumananzombe kana kuti state of disaster panyaya yechikafu ave kureva kuti vave kusimbisa mabasa ekutsvaga mari yekubatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe. WFP yainge yati ichabatsira vanhu vanopfuura zviuru mazana masere munyika asi inogona kuwedzerwa huwandu uhu. Payakati inoda kubatsira vanhu ava zvainzi vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu ndivo vaida chikafu munyika asi ikozvino vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana. Mukuru weChristian Care, rimwe sangano rinobatsira nechikafu richishanda neWFP, Reverend Stanlus Chatikobo vanoti nzara yapfunya chisero munyika uye kuwana zvekudya kuri kunetsa. VaChatikobo vati kana vawana mari vanobatsira vanhu nemadhora gumi pamunhu mumhuri. Vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu kusanganisa kuSouth Africa kusingawanzopihwe chikafu vanonzi vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa kudunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica. No media source currently available

column2: Argentina Yomirira Morocco Kana France
column3: Mutambi ane mukurumbira pasi rose, Lionel Messi nezuro akatungamira nyika yake yeArgentina kurova Croatia 3-0 mumasemifainari emutambo weWorld Cup kuQatar. Argentina yamirira kuona kuti ichatama nenyika ipi pakati peMorocco neFrance idzo dziri kutamba nhasi, Chitatu. Messi akanwisa chibodzwa chekutanga mushure mekunge nyika yake yapihwa penalty kwapera maminetsi makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe-39" mins. Zvimwe zvibodzwa zviviri zvakanwiswa naJulian Alvarez mushure memaminetsi makumi matatu nemana-34" mins uye muchikamu chechipiri kwapera maminetsi makumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe-69' mins. Nyika inenge yakuandwa ichatamba neCroatia pakuona kuti ndechipi chikwata chinotora chinzvimbo chechitatu mumakundano aya. Mutambo uyu uriko musi weMugovera nengubva dza5 manheru. Mutambo wekupedzisir weWorld cup uri kutambwa nemusi weSvondo nenguva dza5 manheru.

column2: Zanu PF Inoudzwa neMatare Kuti Isashandise Vana veChikoro Mumisangano Yayo
column3: Zanu PF yaudzwa nedare repamusoro kuti haifanirwe kumanikidza vana vechikoro kuenda kumisangano yayo, uye kuti isashandise midziyo yezvikoro. Vachipa mutongo wavo panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nesangano rinomirira varairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, VaJoseph Mafusire varambidza Zanu PF kuitira misangano yayo yekukwezva rutsigiro pazvikoro uye kushandisa midziyo yezvikoro yakaita semabhazi. Mushure mekunzwa mativi ose kubva kugweta ranga richimirira Zanu PF, VaMichael Mushangwe, negweta re ARTUZ, VaDoug Coltart, VaMafusire vati dare raona paine humbowo hwakadzama hwunoratidza kuti kodzero dzevana vechikoro nevadzidzisi dzainge dzichimbunyikidwa neZanu PF uye kutyorwa kwemubumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaMafusire vati kumanikidza vana kuenda kumisangno iyi kunogona kukuvadza pfungwa dzavo zvisingazogadzirisiki nekudaro hapana anofanira kuramba achivamanikidza. VaColtart vati vagamuchira mutongo wedare nemufaro vachiti mutongi aremekedza kodzero dzevana vechikoro uye vadzidzisi. Asi VaMushangwe vati havana kufara nemutongo uyu vachiti hauna kuitwa zvakanaka. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muARTUZ muMasvingo, Muzvare Precious Manyoka, vanoti vatambira mutongo uyu nemufaro. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti Zanu PF inofanirwa kuremekedza mutongo wapihwa nedare redzimohosva. No media source currently available
